words: Ben  ga  na - egwu mmiri  (ugbua).
gloss: Ben        MOD         hab - swim    water         now
translation: Ben must be swimming (right now).
comment: ga is the future marker which presumably has a modal meaning and is therefore glossed as MOD

words: Ben  ga  na - egwu  riri mmiri  (ugbua).
gloss: Ben        MOD         hab - swim     MOD   water         now
translation: Ben must be swimming (right now).

words: * John         ga - ano          n’uloakwukwo.

words: * John no-riri n'uloakwukwo.

words: E 	kwesiri na 	mmiri 	ga 	na - ezo 	na 	Goa.

words: Mary 	kwesiri i - no 	  	n’ulo.
gloss: Mary	MOD 	inf - be.loc	prep.house
translation: Mary should be at home.

words: # Mary ga-ano riri n’ulo.
gloss: Mary MOD-be.loc MOD prep.house
translation: Mary should be at home.
comment: stronger induction. Really sure (not much room for doubt)

words: O 	nwere 	ike 	   i - bia 	uloakwukwo 	taa.
gloss: 3sg 	have 	strength  inf - come 	school 		today
translation: He might be coming to school today.
comment: Idiomatic, fixed expression “have strength” for possibility

words: Iheolu 		Grace 	nwere 	ike 	     na 	o 	fuola.
gloss: necklace 	Grace 	have 	strength    that 	it 	lost.pfv
translation: Grace’s necklace might be lost.

words: Busu         ahu         nwere         ike           i - no            n’ime                 ulo … Busu ahu         nwe -kwa - ra         ike              i - no         n’iro.
gloss: cat           det           have         strength inf - be.loc         prep.inside         house… cat         det         have- add - rV  strength   inf - be.loc    prep.outside
translation: The cat may be inside. The cat may also be outside.
comment: Nwe-kwa-ra -> with the additive morpheme kwa,  -ra takes the vowel of the internal morpheme, so it’s a different form of the unit nwere

words: Daniel 	 nwere 	ike 	  i -  ga 	New York.
gloss: Daniel	 have 	strength inf -go N.Y.
translation: Daniel might go to New York.

words: # Daniel ga-aga-ni N.Y.
gloss: Daniel MOD-go-MOD N.Y.
translation: Daniel might go to New York.
